function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of fresh air inflow due to reluctance to provide windows that can be opened","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to poor ventilation","Mitigation":"Design windows that accommodate air inflow while preventing objects from being discarded","Technologies":"Advanced window design with ventilation features","People":"Hotel developers, multi-residential complex owners","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building designers"},{"Description":"Cross-floor contamination risk in elevator shafts","Impact":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases between floors","Mitigation":"Implement pressure differentials and continuous positive airflow from the corridor into the elevator shaft","Technologies":"Ventilation slots, pressure differentials","People":"Hotel developers, building owners, architects","Owner":"Engineers, building designers"},{"Description":"Potential residence time of fine aerosols in elevator cabins","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to prolonged exposure to contaminated air","Mitigation":"Continuous inflow of filtered, lightly pressurized air from the top of the cabin, expulsion at the bottom, and adjustment of airflow based on cabin occupancy","Technologies":"Filtered air inflow, pressure regulation, weight sensors","People":"Hotel developers, building owners, architects","Owner":"Engineers, building designers"}]}
